markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Crunch](/Feats.aspx?ID=5590) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kholo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=758" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 18 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

Your jaws can crush bone and bite through armor. Your jaws [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=719) attack deals 1d8 piercing damage instead of 1d6 and gains the [grapple](/Traits.aspx?ID=619) trait.
name: Crunch
